content.query:
----------------------------
----COPY INTO--------------
---------------------------

CREATE TABLE copy_into_table
(
    Dealer_ID  VARCHAR(4000),
    Model_ID   VARCHAR(4000),
    Branch_ID  VARCHAR(4000),
    Date_ID    VARCHAR(4000),
    Units_Sold BIGINT,
    Revenue    BIGINT
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN
)

------------------------------------
-------Loading Data-----------------
-----------------------------------

COPY INTO copy_into_table
(
     Dealer_ID 1,
    Model_ID   2,
    Branch_ID  3,
    Date_ID    4,
    Units_Sold 5,
    Revenue    
)
FROM 'https://azuresynpasedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/cetas_revenue/'
WITH
(
    FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity')
)


SELECT * FROM copy_into_table

-------------------------------------------
--------CREATE PARQUET FILE FORMAT--------
-----------------------------------------

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquet_format_dpool
WITH
(
  FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
  DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'    
)
